CustomField.description: Knowing what topics will be covered helps the user to prepare for the interview.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select one that best fits the content of the interview. General Interviews are "get to know you." Technical are asking technical questions. Case interviews are common for consulting roles. In a case interview, the interviewer usually presents a scenario or problem—the “case”—and asks specific questions on how you would address its challenge(s).
CustomField.label: Interview Content Type
